the ICAS1 software shall set so_SI_NWDF equal to [Ueberwachung_freigegeben] ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1659 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para:
Requirement is not verified If one of the following conditions is fulfilled (OR-Condition): SW-KL15 is OFF sw_Network_Failure_Detection = FALSE,
the ICAS1 software shall set so_SI_NWDF equal to [Ueberwachung_nicht_freigegeben]. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1660 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified The latency period between the input information (as stated in the SWR_ICAS1_GW_1659 and SWR_ICAS1_GW_1660) and the output of the NWDF-Bits AND so_SI_NWDF signal as per the [K-Matrix] on a Bus shall not exceed tNWDF_inhibit. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1666 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified If the following conditions are fulfilled (AND-Condition), the software shall set sw_Network_Failure_Detection to TRUE. sw_vehicle_engine_starting = FALSE sw_Undervoltage_detection = FALSE sw_Overvoltage_detection = FALSE, ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1669 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified If one of the following conditions is fulfilled (OR-Condition), the software shall set sw_Network_Failure_Detection to FALSE. sw_vehicle_engine_starting = TRUE sw_Undervoltage_detection = TRUE sw_Overvoltage_detection = TRUE,
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1670 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1620
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: CentAND_ControlNetDiag ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/NetworkDiagnosisFlag/c/inc/CentrActivationNetDiag.h line 269
Requirement is not verified The ICAS1 software shall set the signal sw_vehicle_engine_starting to TRUE, if one of the following conditions is fulfilled (OR-Condition) sw_MO_Drehzahl_01 < 600 U/min AND sw_MO_StartStopp_Wiederstart = 1 SW-KL15 is ON AND the last received value for sw_MO_Kl_75 goes from 1 to 0 the last received value for sw_MO_Kl_50 goes from 0 to 1, ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1620 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1650
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: CentANDCheckUbattRanges ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/NetworkDiagnosisFlag/c/src/CentrActivationNetDiag.c line 484
Requirement is not verified If 3 consecutive ADC samples are greater than 17,0V (+0V / - 0,1V), the ICAS1 software shall set sw_Overvoltage_detection = TRUE. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1650 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not verified If one ADC sample is smaller than 16,5V, the ICAS1 software shall set sw_Overvoltage_detection = FALSE. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1651 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified If 3 consecutive ADC samples are smaller than 9,4V (+0,1V / - 0,0V), the ICAS1 software shall set sw_Undervoltage_detection = TRUE. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1653 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not verified If one ADC sample is greater than 9,9V, the ICAS1 software shall set sw_Undervoltage_detection = FALSE. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_1654 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
